com.topcoder.service.user
Class UserServiceException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          com.topcoder.util.errorhandling.BaseException
              com.topcoder.util.errorhandling.BaseCriticalException
                  com.topcoder.service.user.UserServiceException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
@WebFault(name="user_service_fault",
          faultBean="com.topcoder.service.user.UserServiceFault")
public class UserServiceException
extends com.topcoder.util.errorhandling.BaseCriticalException

A common exception class for the user services.

Updated for Jira and Confluence User Sync Widget 1.0 - Specified the @WebFault mapping - Initialize fault message too. - For proper exception serialization to webservice faultInfo is also initialized now

Since:
Cockpit Release Assembly for Receipts
Version:
1.0
Author:
snow01, TCSASSEMBLER
See Also:
Serialized Form

getFaultMessage

public java.lang.String getFaultMessage()

Return the faultMessage

Returns:
the faultMessage

getFaultInfo

public UserServiceFault getFaultInfo()

Return the fault bean. This method is necessary for the serialization/deserialization. it returns null if the constructors without fault bean are used.

Returns:
returns fault bean
